html:
4.29.20  12:21 pm   i am absolutely terrible at singing, can i get some tips?

      try making up the lyrics at the same time

4.29.20  12:15 pm   How many times does the day go on before it starts to hold on?

      that depends on wind and turbulence patterns

4.29.20  12:07 pm   what is something you like?

      a fresh can of worms, with an expiration date far far in the future. in a year i've never dreamed of yet

4.29.20  12:03 pm   Hello I would like to ask why your videos are so good

      sometimes that's just what happens when you open a can of worms

4.29.20  11:33 am   How to misspell one letter words?

      put the wrong letter

4.29.20  11:32 am   what do you do if you bent your hat

      see if you can bend your mind to go with it

4.29.20  11:26 am   Do you think that this is the peak of humanity and it's only going downhill from here

      no

4.29.20  11:24 am   Are there any easter eggs on this site?

      no but there is an easter bunny

4.29.20  11:21 am   Do you answer these questions as a calculated form of creative distraction to keep you out of song-writers rut?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.29.20  11:16 am   just did a bad thing

      oh now you've got me wondering what the thing was

4.29.20  10:57 am   what happened to the neighborhood in slow down, where'd it go

      could simply be outside the view frustum

4.29.20  10:54 am   tell me a jok e

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

4.29.20  10:38 am   In mount Saint Helen, did you actually try to warn us that the dow jones will indeed fall to 0?

      no

4.29.20  10:23 am   does it rain on mars?

      i doubt it

4.29.20  10:12 am   Thoughts on bagpipes?

      it's easy to forget the bag, but you must not forget the bag

4.29.20  9:45 am   how can i learn more words? i've been at home and at school which i guess is a workplace

      start watching videos in other languages

4.29.20  9:39 am   What's the 1 piece Of advice you would give others about life?

      always get a second piece of advice, from another source. to compare

4.29.20  9:35 am   should i do something?

      yes, thank you for checking with me first

4.29.20  9:34 am   do you code?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.29.20  9:01 am   Is it possible to stop having self-doubt?

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it i'm not sure

4.29.20  8:52 am   Any idea what time is it now?

      Thursday, April 30, 2020 2:16:43 PM

4.29.20  8:39 am   since you can go to a place with a different time zone as where you originally came from, is that time travelling?

     all travel is time travel, but not because of time zones. travel always requires time, in order to occur. that's why you may have noticed that whenever you travel somewhere it is always a different time when you get there

      but then, what is the real present time?

     now

      is time even real?

      yes

4.29.20  8:39 am   Why is the link to this https://billwurtz.com/questions/questions.html
and not
https://billwurtz.com/questions/ueqstions.html
?

      because this is the questions page (which has been stylized in the title heading as ueqstions), not the ueqstions page

4.29.20  8:14 am   what is a potato

      an explosion, of flavor!

4.29.20  7:49 am   What do you think of Flat-earthers?

      they are a myth

4.29.20  7:22 am   are you preparing to achieve the upper echelon of quality in your content

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.29.20  7:18 am   what is music

      it's like a staircase, but each step is a mini staircase

4.29.20  7:18 am   do you ever feel bad?

      yes, and good

4.29.20  6:37 am   i have cracked the meaning of life using your music. why is the music so... special.

      i'm just trying to get by

4.29.20  6:20 am   hi bill how would you simplify us politics for a european?

      imagine if you combined sports with a soap opera

4.29.20  6:15 am   who's your favorite pokemon

      what's the yellow one

4.29.20  5:59 am   Will you do a face reveal?

      never

4.29.20  5:59 am   what do you think about

      feelings

4.29.20  5:49 am   how do you write neon text

      what the heck is neon text

4.29.20  5:46 am   4.26.20  4:04 pm have you considered writing a song in this kind of latin style?

      of course. nothing should ever be off limits, when it comes to style

4.29.20  5:37 am   how do you make a peanut butter sandwich?  

      take some peanut butter, and put it between peanut butter and more peanut butter.

4.29.20  5:07 am   how large must one be to go to the mall

      what the heck is a mall

4.29.20  4:38 am   i have so much free time to do stuff with all this going on, but i never actually do anything, i just sit down and waste my time. do you have any advice on what i should do to begin creating?

      yes, you must first explain what you wish to create, and then more specifically explain what the next steps are in doing it. it's ok if you don't know the best steps, but you must explain what the steps of your next attempt will be. i think as soon as you know specifically what you are going to do, you will already find yourself doing it

4.29.20  4:22 am   of all the fruits, which fruit is the most fruit

      melon

4.29.20  4:07 am   Did you make it to the South pole yet? you never gave us an update on that.

      that's not true. 3.24.20 8:56 am, 3.19.20 11:12 am, 3.10.20 9:43 am, 3.5.20 8:30 pm, 2.29.20 12:52 am, 2.16.20 9:24 am, 2.1.20 1:22 am, 12.31.19 1:53 am, 12.27.19 7:51 pm, 11.20.19 11:20 am, 5.7.19 7:17 pm, 2.11.19 3:46 am

4.29.20  4:00 am   can you make a poem for me? :D

      sure. imagine a lot of foam. huge fields of foam, as far as the eye can see

4.29.20  3:22 am   I love the color in your videos, which is your favorite color?

      grey

4.29.20  3:14 am   How does one avoid being consumed by an endless void of existential despair and fear given the current state of the world?

      do a talk show

4.29.20  2:49 am   Why are you cool?

      that could be due to the vast quantities of normalcy and normalness which i have coursing through my veins, day in and day out

4.29.20  2:45 am   are you bored right now?

      no

4.29.20  2:44 am   how can i make friends

      you must be the friend

4.29.20  2:41 am   what is your opinion on pluto's planethood???

      i haven't thought about it very much

4.29.20  2:33 am   cookies are good?

      that may be true

4.29.20  2:32 am   I feel like when I make something, the process of me making it has made me better at it, which is good, but also it raises my standards for myself so whenever I look back at what I've been working on I'm just disappointed in my work. I know it's a sign that I'm improving but it's still discouraging because I feel like I can never make something I'm proud of. Any advice on working past it?

      no, but it sounds like you are doing great already

4.29.20  2:13 am   Is The World Getting Better?

      yes, all the time
